EFRAG has, since October 2023, released the following batches of explanations (number of
explanations):
February 2024 12
March 2024 12
May 2024 44
July 2024 25
November 2024 64
Total 157
The next major update of the Compilation of Explanations is expected to be released in Spring
2025. This document contains all 157 explanations on a consolidated basis. The questions are
